pros: I started my career with AIESEC and there's no better way than to start working alongside pro-active, driven and purposeful people. People is the key Pro for the organization, as their will to make things happen really comes through.
cons: It's short the time you have to dedicate to the organization, but it makes sense and it makes it so intense that your takeaways are so much more.

job_title: Vice President in Ḩawwārah, Amman Governorate
pros: International Volunteering plat that unlocks a lot of opportunities.
cons: Heavy work load and commitment required.
